mapper.update: update sku_category set category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_desc = #{categoryDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select category_id, category_name, category_desc, app_id, created_time, updated_time from sku_category
